# ListUtility.InReverse&lt;T&gt; method

Yields the items of the list in reverse order.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<T> InReverse<T>(this IList<T> list)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | The type of item in the list. |
| list | The list. |

## Return Value

A sequence of the items in reverse order.
